page.title: 04MY SUNDAY.
page.content: I woke up, looked out of the window and saw that it was raining. I got washed and dressed and went downstairs for a breakfast of toast and a drink of milk. I woke my brother and, when we were all ready, we got in the car and set off for Grandma's. On arrival, my brother and I played with my cousin and then I had a game of tennis with my dad. I won. My brother, cousin and I made a den in the trees and bushes. We put planks in the trees and an old door in the bushes. I looked at my cousin and saw that her pink dress and white belt were black, so we quickly went in for tea. For our tea we had roast beef, carrots, roast potatoes and gravy followed by a pudding. My Grandma is a very good cook. We got in the car and drove home in the dark on the motorway. We had baths and went to bed. I read awhile then went to sleep.
